translation.Com mais de 1 ano de experiência na área: With over 1 year of experience in the data area, I am passionate about transforming information into strategic decisions. In one of the projects I lead, I developed a Power BI dashboard that allowed a client to reduce operational costs by 20% and double monthly revenue. This result demonstrates my commitment to creating data-driven solutions that generate a direct and positive impact on businesses.
translation.Atualmente, na MRO, trabalho diariamente: Currently, at MRO, I work daily with Power BI, being responsible for the management and development of dashboards that support decision-making. My work involves everything from designing customized reports to integrating different data sources, ensuring accurate and accessible information. In addition, I contribute to the optimization of corporate processes, implementing improvements through data analysis, automation and systems integration.
translation.Minha experiência prática e técnica tamb: My practical and technical experience also allows me to share knowledge with colleagues, helping to build a data-driven culture. My goal is to always turn challenges into opportunities, using data as the main tool to achieve measurable and consistent results.
translation.Visão Geral da Performance: Métricas ess: Performance Overview: Essential metrics such as revenue, cost, profit, average conversion and engagement, tracking the growth of KPIs compared to the previous year. Advanced Analysis of Leads and Sales Channels.
translation.Monitoramento do tempo médio de operação: Monitoring of average operating time, allowing you to follow the ambulance from departure to arrival at the hospital. View the most used protocols and overall team performance.
translation.Faturamento e Lucro Total e mensal, com: Total and monthly revenue and profit, with annual and weekly comparisons. Best-selling products, profit margin, revenue and profit by category. Revenue, profit margin and average delivery time by branch.
translation.Monitoramento do orçamento, custo real e: Budget monitoring, actual cost and a consumption KPI showing the percentage of the budget used. Shows the accumulated costs over time, visualizing the amounts spent with each supplier.
translation.Valor total de compras e total de pedido: Total purchase value and total orders for monitoring overall spending and volumes. On-time and off-time purchases, and canceled purchases. OTIF (On-Time In-Full), an indicator for monitoring supply chain efficiency.
translation.acompanhamento de acidentes em rodovias: monitoring of accidents on federal highways
translation.Acompanhamento de Acidentes: Dados sobre: Accident Monitoring: Data on events, victims and deaths on federal highways, highlighting the most affected states, times and main causes.
translation.O dashboard acompanha o faturamento real: The dashboard tracks actual revenue and target, highlighting the percentage difference by branch. It includes comparative graphs by month, analysis of target deviation and filters for viewing by year and branch.
translation.Visão Geral da Satisfação: Métricas como: Satisfaction Overview: Metrics such as questions answered, job titles, employees and recruitment sources, as well as the evolution of satisfaction and demographic KPIs.
translation.Performance NBA: Dados de pontos, acerto: NBA Performance: Detailed scoring, shooting and stats data, with team and player insights, highlighting metrics like PPP, turnovers and steals.
translation.Acompanhamento Financeiro: Métricas esse: Financial Monitoring: Essential metrics such as Revenue, Costs, Gross Profit, EBITDA and Net Profit, analyzing financial evolution by year, country and category.
translation.Este curso ensina a criar e personalizar: This course teaches you how to create and customize interactive data visualization applications with Streamlit, covering everything from the basics to deploying them to the cloud. You will learn how to structure an app, customize the interface, explore FIFA data, and publish your project to Streamlit Cloud. Ideal for those who want to transform analyses into dynamic dashboards quickly and intuitively.
translation.Analisando Dados com Pandas & SQL: Analyzing Data with Pandas and SQL
translation.Este curso oferece uma introdução prátic: This course provides a practical introduction to Pandas, covering everything from basic concepts to advanced SQL usage. You will learn how to filter, group, and combine tables, as well as perform real-world analyses, such as gasoline prices in Brazil, global obesity, and GDP per capita. The course ends with a hands-on challenge, consolidating the knowledge acquired.
translation.No curso, aprendi a publicar e gerenciar: In the course, I learned how to publish and manage reports, implement security with RLS, connect Power BI to multiple data sources (Google Sheets, SharePoint, APIs, databases), and set up automatic refreshes and dataflows. I also explored real-time and streaming data with Power Automate and forms.
translation.No curso da Empower Data, aprendi a auto: In the Empower Data course, I learned how to automate processes with Power Automate, setting up triggers and actions, manipulating variables and loops, creating parallel flows with JSON, and integrating with Power BI, SharePoint, and Teams. I also explored AI Builder for advanced analytics.
translation.O curso foi dividido em atividades focad: The course was divided into activities focused on programming and Python. It began with the Course Introduction, followed by Programming Logic and Introduction to Python. Then, it covered the Fundamentals of the language, the first Project to build a calculator, and the Management Software project for a car rental company. It included the OS module, Error Management and Code Debugging, the Rock, Paper, Scissors project, Object-Oriented Programming, and ended with the Simulating Chaos in Gyms project.
translation.O curso de SQL cobriu desde os fundament: The SQL course covered everything from the fundamentals to advanced topics. It began with an introduction to relational databases and basic commands (SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE), followed by joins, aggregate functions, and subqueries. It covered data manipulation, transactions, performance optimization with indexes, and security. It included creating Views, Stored Procedures, and triggers, as well as data modeling and SQL for Big Data. The course also included hands-on projects and preparation for SQL certifications.
translation.Curso COMPLETO de Excel do Básico ao Ava: COMPLETE Excel Course from Basic to Advanced + Dashboards
translation.O curso de Excel, do básico ao avançado,: The Excel course, from beginner to advanced, covered everything from basic functions (SUM, AVERAGE) to advanced functions (VLOOKUP, INDEX, HLOOKUP), graphs and pivot tables. It taught data manipulation, validation, macros and VBA for automation. The final part focused on creating interactive dashboards, with advanced graphs and dynamic controls for data visualization. The course included practical exercises to apply the knowledge in corporate scenarios.
translation.O curso abordou a transformação de dados: The course covered data transformation with Power Query, dimensional modeling (Star Schema and Snow Flake), and mastery of advanced DAX formulas. It taught persuasive data visualization and storytelling to present information in an impactful way. It also included the implementation of complete projects and advanced management in Power BI Service for sharing and collaboration.
